data.text:
Published 2:53 am Friday, August 2, 2024

The San Jose State Spartans are +6000 to win the MWC in 2024, as they carry the 10th-ranked odds in the conference. We have more info on futures odds, along with the important statistics you need to know, in the piece below.

Sign up for BetMGM to bet on San Jose State Spartans’ odds to win their conference or the national championship.

San Jose State Mountain West Conference and National Championship Odds

National Championship Odds: Currently Unavailable

Mountain West Conference Championship Odds: +6000 (Bet $10 to win $600.00)

Season Win Total Over/Under: 4.5 (Bet $10 to win $10.50 on the over with +105 odds)

Bet on San Jose State Spartans futures odds & games on BetMGM.

San Jose State 2024 Schedule

According to the team’s opponents’ combined win total last season (66), San Jose State will have the 93rd-ranked schedule in college football. In 2024, the Spartans will go head-to-head with six teams that had winning records last season, including one that won nine or more games, while facing three squads that totaled three or fewer wins a season ago.

Watch San Jose State Spartans games all season long on Fubo!
